p:music.p:name: Flying Kites
p:music.p:description: Along with two engineers, Niall Riches and Rich Cartledge, Matt worked on this album for the best part of 3 years. They poured their souls into this record, and Matt would love for you to hear it.

p:music.p:name: The Unknown (Live) EP
p:music.p:description: Recorded Live at Firebug, Leicester by Niall Riches, this EP Comes in a hand-made card case, with artwork by Josh Roberts. It includes a CD, unlimited streaming of The Unknown Live EP via the free Bandcamp app, plus high-quality downloads in MP3, FLAC and more.

p:music.p:name: Never Got Far (live in Trinity Chapel)
p:music.p:description: This is a track taken from Matt's debut album "Flying Kites". This was recorded quickly during a session recording for the studio version, where Matt and Martha the cellist decided to just go for it. It ended up sounding pretty good, we're sure you'll agree!

p:track.p:name: Never Got Far (live in Trinity Chapel)

p:music.p:name: Waves
p:music.p:description: An earlier song from Matt in which his folk influences comes through. Recorded by himself in a home studio and playing every instrument, this is one of Matts first recorded songs.

p:music.p:name: Back On The Road
p:music.p:description: An earlier song from Matt in which his folk influences comes through. Recorded by himself in a home studio and playing every instrument, this is one of Matts first recorded songs.
